Content: Hello Developer. This app is the best novel creator I've seen so far. It's very simple and it has everything I need. However, once I compile my novel through EPUB3, the output itself crashes when imported into an ebook reader. It creates a note on the topmost page of my novel and it says "This page contains the following errors:error on line 254 at column 303: Entity 'nbsp' not defined Below is a rendering of the page up to the first error". I could have given you a rate of 5 stars if it didn't happen. Above all, I love your app☺
I'm sure this app would be great if I could open it, but every time I try it crashes.

Thank you for this app, I love it! It's easy to use and navigate. I also loved exploring the options behind the controls because there's more to it beneath the surface! The metadata is a great feature as well as the tabs you can customize.I just love how I can fill it in without being choked by rigid templates and options that give me writer's block. May I just recommend that can you please put a note or something that tells the exact size for the cover photo? Though I already had figured the size out by trial and error in editing my pictures; the ratio is about 3:4 of Pinterest pictures if I remember correctly. I just want that small dialogue to be added for other users' benefit. Overall the app is great and there's a lot more to explore in the Outline and Organize section which I have scarcely checked out yet. The app is working smooth and I had never encountered lags or crashes. I just had problems when losing newly added texts in the metadata, but that's entirely my fault as I always forget to click save. Thank you so much for this app! It's a big help to a broke student like me who can't pay for app purchases. God bless you always and keep up the good work!
An extremely nice app for writers. Crash problem is very common. So pls solve it.
Worse than a game that alaways crashes
